item.name: App Auth
item.description: All auth related methods for Apps via API

request.description: A new user can register, but an admin has to authorize

once logged in, we need to send the following to client
1. user record
2. access token

Check this status before calling any api method.
If the status is not 'ready', dont proceed with it, show a modal

Enum ('ready','maintenance','updating')
If email found in the user table, send email with link to reset password
Get user settings of ogged in user
Use this for pulldown-to-refresh function of the app dashbaord
Display a listing of the resource.

response.body: Redirecting to http://localhost.

request.description: Show the form for creating a new resource.

response.body: Redirecting to http://localhost.

request.description:
Store a newly created resource in storage.
Uses transactions to prevent partial data updates

variable.description: id of the book to view.

response.body: Redirecting to http://localhost.

request.description: Show the form for editing the specified resource.

response.body: Redirecting to http://localhost.

request.description: Update the specified resource in storage.
Remove the specified resource from storage.

item.name: Display a listing of the resource.
